hatred.reason: Only 1 jinxed character can be in play. Evil players start knowing which player & character it is.
If there are 2 living Al-Hadikhias, the Scarlet Woman Al-Hadikhia becomes the Scarlet Woman again.
The Baron might only add 1 Outsider, not 2.
If the Cannibal gains the Butler ability, the Cannibal learns this.
The Cerenovus may choose to make a player mad that they are the Goblin.
The Chambermaid learns if the Mathematician wakes tonight or not, even though the Chambermaid wakes 1st.
If the Fang Gu chooses an Outsider & dies, the Scarlet Woman does not become the Fang Gu.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
An evil Townsfolk is only created if the Bounty Hunter is still in play after the Kazali acts.
TShe Kazali cannot choose the King to become a Minion if a Choirboy is in play.
If the Kazali chooses the Goon to become a Minion, remaining Minions choices are decided by the Storyteller.
If the Kazali chooses the Damsel to become a Minion, & a Huntsman is in play, a good player becomes the Damsel.
If the Kazali chooses to create a Marionette, they must choose 1 of their neighbours.
The Kazali cannot choose to create a Summoner.
Legion & the Engineer cannot both be in play at the start of the game. If the Engineer creates Legion, most players (including all evil players) become evil Legion.
If the Hatter dies & Legion is in play, nothing happens. If the Hatter dies & an evil player chooses Legion, all current evil players become Legion.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
If the Summoner creates Legion, most players (including all evil players) become evil Legion.
If the Leviathan is in play & the Banshee dies by execution, all players learn that the Banshee has died, and the Banshee gains their ability.
If the Leviathan is in play & a Farmer dies by execution, a good player becomes a Farmer that night.
If the Hatter dies on or after day 5, the Demon cannot choose Leviathan.
If the Leviathan nominates & executes a player the Innkeeper chose, that player does not die.
If the Leviathan is in play & no execution occurs on day 5, good wins.
If the Leviathan nominates & executes the player the Monk chose, that player does not die.
If the Leviathan is in play & the Ravenkeeper dies by execution, the Ravenkeeper waks that night to use their ability.
If the Leviathan is in play & the Sage dies by execution, the Sage wakes that night to use their ability.
If the Leviathan nominates & executes the Soldier, the Soldier does not die.
If a Demon chooses Lil' Monsta, they also choose a Minion to become & babysit Lil' Monsta tonight.
Votes for the Organ Grinder count if Organ Grinder is babysitting Lil' Monsta.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
If the Poppy Grower is in play, Minions don't wake together. They are woken individually, until 1 of them chooses to take the Lil' Monsta token.
If there are 5 or more players alive & the player holding the Lil' Monsta token dies, the Scarlet Woman is given the Lil' Monsta token tonight.
The Vizier can die by execution if they are babysitting Lil' Monsta.
If the Lleech has poisoned the Heretic then the Lleech dies, the Heretic remains poisoned.
If the Mastermind is alive & the Lleech's host dies by execution, the Lleech lives but loses their ability.
If the Slayer slays the Lleech's host, the host dies.
If the Summoner creates a Lord of Typhon, the Lord of Typhon must neighbor a Minion. The other neighbor becomes a not-in-play evil Minion.
The Mathematician learns if the Lunatic attacks a different player(s) than the real Demon attacked.
If the Lycanthrope is alive & the Gambler kills themself at night, no other players can die tonight.
If the Marionette thinks that they are the Balloonist, 1 Outisder was added.
The Marionette does not learn that the Damsel is in play.
If the Marionette thinks that they are the Huntsman, the Damsel was added.
The Marionette neighbours a Minion, not the Demon. The Marionette is not woken to choose who takes the Lil' Monsta token.
When the Poppy Grower dies, the Demon learns the Marionette but the Marionette learns nothing.
The Marionette does not learn 3 not-in-play characters. The Demon learns an extra 3 instead.
If the Organ Grinder is causing eyes closed voting, the Butler may raise their hand to vote but their vote is only counted if their master voted too.
If the Organ Grinder is causing eyes closed voting, the Flowergirl learns how many times the Demon voted.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play. Evil players start knowing which player & character it is.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play. Evil players start knowing which player & character it is.
If a Pit-Hag creates a Damsel, the Storyteller chooses which player it is.
A Pit-Hag cannot create a Heretic.
A Pit-Hag cannot create an evil Politician.
If there is a spare token, a Pit-Hag can create an extra Village Idiot. If so, the drunk Village idiot might change.
If the Storyteller gains the Baron ability, up to 2 players become not-in-play Outsiders.
If the Plague Doctor is executed & the Storyteller would gain the Boomdandy ability, the Boomdandy ability triggers immediately.
The Storyteller cannot gain the Evil Twin ability if the Plague Doctor dies.
If the Plague Doctor dies, a living Minion gains the Fearmonger ability in addition to their own ability & learns this.
If the Plague Doctor dies, a living Minion gains the Goblin ability in addition to their own ability & learns this.

If the Demon has a neighbour who is alive & a Townsfolk or Outsider when the Plague Doctor dies, that player becomes an evil Marionette. If there is already an extra evil player, this does not happen.
If the Plague Doctor dies, a living Minion gains the Scarlet Woman ability in addition to their own ability & learns this.
If the Plague Doctor dies, a living Minion gains the Spy ability in addition to their own ability & learns this.
If the Plague Doctor dies, a living Minion gains the Widow ability in addition to their own ability & learns this.
If a Riot platyer nominates and kills the Banshee, all players learn that the Banshee has dided, and the Banshee may nominate two players immediately.
The Butler cannot nominate their master.
Players that die by nomination register as being executed to the Cannibal.
If a Riot player nominates & kills the King & the Choirboy is alive, the Choirboy uses their ability tonight.
Riot registers as a Minion to the Clockmaker.
Riot registers as a Minion to the Damsel.
Players that die by nomination register as being executed to the Devil's Advocate.
Riot & the Engineer cannot both be in play at the start of the game. If the Engineer creates Riot, the evil players become Riot.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
If a Riot player nominates & kills the Farmer, a good player becomes a Farmer that night.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
If the Golem nominates Riot, the Riot player does not die.
If a Riot player nominates & kills the Grandchild, the Grandmother dies too.

If the Hatter dies, Riot is in play & a Riot player chooses a different Demon, a normal evil team is created from the Riot players. If the Hatter dies & the Demon chooses Riot, Minions become Riot too.
If a Riot player nominates a player the Innkeeper chose, that player does not die.
Riot registers as a Minion to the Investigator.
If the 3rd day begins with just three players alive, the players may choose (as a group) not to nominate at all. If they do so & a Mayor is alive, then the Mayor's team wins.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
If a Riot player nominates & kills the player the Monk chose, that player does not die.
Players that die by nomination register as being executed to the Pacifist.
If the Pit-Hag creates Riot, all evil players become Riot. If the Pit-Hag creates Riot after day 3, the game continues for 1 more day.
Riot registers as a Minion to the Preacher.
If a Riot player nominates & kills the Ravenkeeper, the Ravenkeeper uses their ability tonight.
If a Riot player nominates & kills the Sage, the Sage uses their ability tonight.
If a good player nominates & kills the Saint, the Saint's team loses.
If the Snitch is in play, each Riot player gets an extra 3 bluffs.
If a Riot player nominates the Soldier, the Soldier does not die.
If the Summoner creates Riot, the chosen player & all evil players becom Riot. The chosen player must be 1 of the Summoner's living good neighbours.
Riot registers as a Minion to the Town Crier.
Players that die by nomination register as being executed to the Undertaker.
The Alchemist cannot have the Spy ability.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
When the Spy sees the Grimoire, the Demon & Magician's character tokens are removed.
If the Poppy Grower is in play, the Spy does not see the Grimoire until the Poppy Grower dies.

If there is an Alchemist-Summoner in play, the game starts with a Demon in play, as normal. If the Alchemist-Summoner chooses a player, they make that player a Demon but do not change thier alignment.
If the Summoner is in play, the Clockmaker does not receive their information until a Demon is created.
If the Summoner is drunk on the 3rd night, the Summoner chooses which Demon, but the Storyteller chooses which player.
If the Engineer removes a Summoner from play before that Summoner uses their ability, the Summoner uses their ability immediately.
The Summoner cannot create an in-play Demon. If the Summoner creates a not-in-play Demon, deaths tonight are arbitrary.
The Marionette neighbours the Summoner. The Summoner knows who the Marionette is.
The Summoner cannot create an in-play Demon. If the Summoner creates a not-in-play Demon, deaths tonight are arbitrary.
If the Poppy Grower is alive when the Summoner acts, the Summoner chooses which Demon, but the Storyteller chooses which player.
The Summoner may choose a player to become the Pukka on the 2nd night.
If the Summoner turns a dead player into the Zombuul, the Storyteller treats that player as a Zombuul that has died once.
If the Vortox is in play and the Demon kills the Banshee, the players still learn that the Banshee has died.
If the Alchemist has the Vizier ability, they may only choose to execute immediately if three or more players voted, regardless of those players' alignment.
If the Vizier loses their ability, they learn this & if the Vizier is executed while they have their ability, their team wins.
The Vizier wakes with the Fearmonger, learns who they choose & cannot choose to execute that player.
If the Investigator learns that the Vizier is in play, the existence of the Vizier is not announced by the Storyteller.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play. Evil players start knowing which player & character it is.
If the Vizier loses their ability, they learn this & if the Vizier is executed while they have their ability, their team wins.
The Alchemist cannot have the Widow ability.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
When the Widow sees the Grimoire, the Demon & Magician's character tokens are removed.
If the Poppy Grower is in play, the Widow does not see the Grimoire until the Poppy Grower dies.
If the Exorcist chooses the Yaggababble, the Yaggababble ability does not kill tonight.
